mapper.select:
select top 6 * from ( SELECT count(t.PKID) as count,o.ID,o.ORG_NAME as orgName FROM [sctrans].[T_TO_TRANS_PLAN] as t
left join sctrans.t_TO_workflow as w on w.case_code=t.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.act_ru_task ta on ta.[TASK_DEF_KEY_]=t.PART_CODE and w.INST_CODE=ta.[PROC_INST_ID_] and ta.suspension_state_='1' left join sctrans.LAMP_RULE l on GETDATE()-t.EST_PART_TIME>=l.DELAYTIME left join sctrans.SYS_USER as u on ta.ASSIGNEE_=u.USERNAME left join sctrans.v_user_org_job as uoj on uoj.[USER_ID]=u.ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on uoj.ORG_ID=o.ID where u.id is not null and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and color='1' group by o.ID,o.ORG_NAME )as a order by count desc

select top 6 * from ( SELECT count(t.PKID) as count,u.EMPLOYEE_CODE as eCode,u.REAL_NAME as realName FROM [sctrans].[T_TO_TRANS_PLAN] as t
left join sctrans.t_TO_workflow as w on w.case_code=t.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.act_ru_task ta on ta.[TASK_DEF_KEY_]=t.PART_CODE and w.INST_CODE=ta.[PROC_INST_ID_] and ta.suspension_state_='1' left join sctrans.LAMP_RULE l on GETDATE()-t.EST_PART_TIME>=l.DELAYTIME left join sctrans.SYS_USER as u on ta.ASSIGNEE_=u.USERNAME left join sctrans.v_user_org_job as uoj on uoj.[USER_ID]=u.ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on uoj.ORG_ID=o.ID where u.id is not null and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and color='1' group by o.ID,u.ID,u.EMPLOYEE_CODE,u.REAL_NAME )as a order by count desc

select top 6 * from sctrans.T_TS_DAYLY_RANK where RANK_CAT=#{rankCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RANK_TYPE=#{rankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATEDIFF(day, RANK_DAY, GETDATE())=0 and RANK_DURATION=#{rankDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by RANK_NO asc

select * from ( select a.name,a.userId,a.userName as userName, (case when a.estDay=0 then a.taskCount else 0 end) as tCount ,(case when a.estDay=-1 then a.taskCount else 0 end) as yCount from (select u.id as userId, u.REAL_NAME as userName,DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) as estDay,count(*) as taskCount,at.name_ as name
from sctrans.t_HI_workflow as tf right join sctrans.act_ru_task as at on at.PROC_INST_ID_=tf.INST_CODE and at.suspension_state_='1' left join sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN as ttp on ttp.CASE_CODE =tf.CASE_CODE and ttp.PART_CODE=at.TASK_DEF_KEY_ left join sctrans.sys_user as u on u.username=at.ASSIGNEE_ left join sctrans.v_user_org_job as uoj on u.ID = uoj.USER_ID where ttp.CASE_CODE is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE())=0 or DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE())=-1) and uoj.ORG_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) ,u.id,u.REAL_NAME,at.name_ ) as a) as b

select * from ( select a.name, (case when a.estDay=0 then a.taskCount else 0 end) as tCount ,(case when a.estDay=-1 then a.taskCount else 0 end) as yCount from ( select DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) estDay,count(*) as taskCount,at.name_ as name
from sctrans.t_HI_workflow as tf right join sctrans.act_ru_task as at on at.PROC_INST_ID_=tf.INST_CODE and at.suspension_state_='1' left join sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN as ttp on ttp.CASE_CODE =tf.CASE_CODE and ttp.PART_CODE=at.TASK_DEF_KEY_ where ttp.CASE_CODE is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE())=0 or DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE())=-1) and at.ASSIGNEE_=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by DATEDIFF(day, ttp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()),at.name_ ) as a) as b

select count(a.ORG_ID) as rankValue,o.id as belongOrgId,o.ORG_NAME as belongOrgName ,u.employee_code as empCode from sctrans.T_TO_CASE a right join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=a.ORG_ID and a.STATUS = '30001001' left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj on uoj.org_id=o.id left join sctrans.sys_job as j on j.id=uoj.job_id left join sctrans.sys_user as u on u.id=uoj.user_id where j.JOB_CODE='Manager' and u.AVAILABLE=1 and u.is_deleted=0 and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by o.id,o.ORG_NAME,u.employee_code order by COUNT(a.case_code) desc

select count(a.pkid) as rankValue,o.id as belongOrgId,o.ORG_NAME as belongOrgName ,u.employee_code as empCode from sctrans.T_TO_CASE a right join sctrans.T_TO_SIGN b on a.CASE_CODE=b.CASE_CODE and DATEDIFF(MM, b.REAL_CON_TIME,GETDATE())=0 and b.REAL_CON_TIME is not null right join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=a.ORG_ID left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj on uoj.org_id=o.id left join sctrans.sys_job as j on j.id=uoj.job_id left join sctrans.sys_user as u on u.id=uoj.user_id where j.JOB_CODE='Manager' and u.AVAILABLE=1 and u.is_deleted=0 and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by o.id,o.ORG_NAME,u.employee_code order by COUNT(a.case_code) desc

select COUNT(a.case_code) as rankValue,o.id as belongOrgId,o.ORG_NAME as belongOrgName ,u.employee_code as empCode from sctrans.T_TO_CASE as a right join sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER as tht on a.CASE_CODE=tht.CASE_CODE and datediff(MM,tht.REAL_HT_TIME,getdate())=0 and tht.REAL_HT_TIME is not null right join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=a.ORG_ID left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj on uoj.org_id=o.id left join sctrans.sys_job as j on j.id=uoj.job_id left join sctrans.sys_user as u on u.id=uoj.user_id where j.JOB_CODE='Manager' and u.AVAILABLE=1 and u.is_deleted=0 and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by o.id,o.ORG_NAME,u.employee_code order by COUNT(a.case_code) desc

select COUNT(a.case_code) as rankValue,o.id as belongOrgId,o.ORG_NAME as belongOrgName ,u.employee_code as empCode from sctrans.T_TO_CASE as a right join sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR as tg on tg.CASE_CODE=a.CASE_CODE and tg.SRV_CAT='3000400201' right join sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE as tm on tm.CASE_CODE=a.CASE_CODE and datediff(MM,tm.SIGN_DATE,getdate())=0 and tm.SIGN_DATE is not null right join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=a.ORG_ID left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj on uoj.org_id=o.id left join sctrans.sys_job as j on j.id=uoj.job_id left join sctrans.sys_user as u on u.id=uoj.user_id where j.JOB_CODE='Manager' and u.AVAILABLE=1 and u.is_deleted=0 and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by o.id,o.ORG_NAME,u.employee_code order by COUNT(a.case_code) desc

select COUNT(a.case_code) as rankValue,o.id as belongOrgId,o.ORG_NAME as belongOrgName ,u.employee_code as empCode from sctrans.T_TO_CASE as a right join sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR as tg on tg.CASE_CODE=a.CASE_CODE and tg.SRV_CAT='3000400201' right join sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE as tm on tm.CASE_CODE=a.CASE_CODE and datediff(MM,tm.SIGN_DATE,getdate())=0 and tm.SIGN_DATE is not null right join sctrans.SYS_ORG o on o.id=a.ORG_ID left join sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj on uoj.org_id=o.id left join sctrans.sys_job as j on j.id=uoj.job_id left join sctrans.sys_user as u on u.id=uoj.user_id where j.JOB_CODE='Manager' and u.AVAILABLE=1 and u.is_deleted=0 and o.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by o.id,o.ORG_NAME,u.employee_code order by COUNT(a.case_code) desc

select u.real_name as realName,org.org_name as orgName,la.LOAN_SRV_CODE as loanSevCode,la.LOAN_AMOUNT as loanAmount from sctrans.T_TO_LOAN_AGENT la left join sctrans.sys_user u on u.id=la.EXECUTOR_ID left join sctrans.sys_org org on org.id=la.EXECUTOR_TEAM where datediff(MI,la.create_time,getdate())< =1 and la.create_time is not null and org.PARENT_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
